txt.en:
[placeholder],

I have heard many tales of your skill, and enough has been said of your efforts to help us reclaim the mines of Moria. I have need of a practised Mariner's assistance for an expedition onto the Mirrormere. If you wish to aid me, you can find me at Mekhem-bizru in the Dimrill Dale, but beware the Orcs that lurk in Azanulbizar of old. Do not keep me waiting; I will set sail without you if I must!

Byrski Hardprow

'Well, well! I had begun to worry you weren't coming, [placeholder]. Right then, I'll be taking that!'

You hand Byrski Hardprow the letter he sent you, and he crumples it into a ball before stuffing it into one of his pockets.

'If we're going to set out on the Mirrormere today, there's work to be done. I promised Brogur that I would see to this task, and I will not be made a liar!'
You received a letter from Byrski Hardprow, a dwarf of the Iron Garrison stationed in the Dimrill Dale.
Bring the letter to Byrski Hardprow at Mekhem-bizru, in the Dimrill Dale
Byrski Hardprow sent you a letter requesting that you visit him in the Dimrill Dale.\n\nDeliver the letter to Byrski Hardprow. He can be found at Mekhem-bizru in the Dimrill Dale.
